TypeSignature.Value: .class public auto ansi beforefieldinit ClaimTypeRequirement extends System.Object

summary.span: 指定必須在聯合認證中出現的必要及選擇性宣告型別。

span.span: Specifies the types of required and optional claims expected to appear in the federated credential.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 在聯合案例中，服務會聲明對傳入認證的需求。In a federated scenario, services state the requirements on incoming credentials. 例如，傳入認證必須處理特定的一組宣告型別。For example, the incoming credentials must possess a certain set of claim types. 這項需求會顯示在安全性原則中。This requirement is manifested in a security policy. 當用戶端要求來自安全性權杖服務 (例如 [!INCLUDE[infocard](~/includes/infocard-md.md)]) 的安全性權杖時，它會將需求放入權杖要求中，那麼安全性權杖服務便可因此發出滿足需求的安全性權杖。When a client requests a security token from a security token service (for example, [!INCLUDE[infocard](~/includes/infocard-md.md)]), it puts the requirements into a token request so that the security token service can issue the security token that satisfies the requirements accordingly. ## Examples 下列程式碼會將兩項宣告類型需求新增至安全性繫結程序。The following code adds two claim type requirements to a security binding. [!code-csharp[S_UEClaimTypeRequirement#1](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_CFX/s_ueclaimtyperequirement/cs/client.cs#1)] 下列組態檔可與上述程式碼搭配使用。The following config file is used with the preceding code. [!code-xml[S_UEClaimTypeRequirement#101](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_CFX/s_ueclaimtyperequirement/common/app.config#101)]

summary.span: 針對指定之型別的必要宣告初始化 類別的新執行個體。

span.span: Initializes a new instance of the class for a required claim of the specified type.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 預先定義的宣告型別可以在 中找到。The predefined claim types can be found at . ## Examples 下列程式碼會將兩項宣告類型需求新增至安全性繫結程序。The following code adds two claim type requirements to a security binding. [!code-csharp[S_UEClaimTypeRequirement#1](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_CFX/s_ueclaimtyperequirement/cs/client.cs#1)]

summary.span: 取得在建構函式中指定的宣告型別。

span.span: Gets the claim type that was specified in the constructor.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 這個屬性是定義宣告型別的 URI。This property is a URI that defines the type of a claim. 例如，要在網站上購物，使用者必須提供具有足夠信用額度的有效信用卡。For example, to purchase a product from a Web site, the user must present a valid credit card with a sufficient credit limit. 宣告型別是信用卡的 URI。The claim type would be the credit card URI. ## Examples 下列程式碼會示範如何取得這個屬性。The following code shows how to get this property. [!code-csharp[S_UEClaimTypeRequirement#2](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_CFX/s_ueclaimtyperequirement/cs/client.cs#2)]

MemberSignature.Value: Public ReadOnly Property IsOptional As Boolean
public: property bool IsOptional { bool get(); };

Attribute.AttributeName: get: System.Runtime.TargetedPatchingOptOut("Performance critical to inline this type of method across NGen image boundaries")

summary.span: 取得值，這個值表示宣告是否為選擇性的。

span.span: Gets a value that indicates whether the claim is optional.

value.span: 如果這個類別的執行個體可用於選擇性的宣告，則為 ，如果指定必要的項目，則為 。

span.span: if this instance of the class is for an optional claim; if it specifies a required claim.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 這個屬性使用方式的範例是服務要求一些資訊，但卻不需要這些資訊的案例。An example of how to use this property is the scenario in which the service asks for some information but does not require it. 例如，要求您輸入您的姓氏、名字和地址，但輸入您的電話號碼是選擇性的。For instance, you are required to enter your first name, last name, and address, but your phone number is optional. ## Examples 下列程式碼會示範如何取得這個屬性。The following code shows how to get this property. [!code-csharp[S_UEClaimTypeRequirement#2](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_CFX/s_ueclaimtyperequirement/cs/client.cs#2)]
